body_html: I think for the purposes of this PR, the usage of where can remain as designed at the moment. Probably, when the semantics of where change, this part of the code can be revisited and modified accordingly. What do you think @ezyang ?

body: I think for the purposes of this PR, the usage of `where` can remain as designed at the moment. Probably, when the semantics of `where` change, this part of the code can be revisited and modified accordingly. What do you think @ezyang ?
